articles.author: Sam Reynolds, James Rubin
articles.title: First Mover Asia: Silicon Valley Bank Failure Highlights Small Banks’ Vulnerability; Bitcoin Soars Past $22.5K - CoinDesk
articles.description: Since September 2021, the growth in cash assets in small bank balance sheets has turned negative.
articles.content:
Good morning. Heres whats happening:
Prices: Bitcoin surged above $22.5K after Federal regulators said they'd cover failed SIVB's customer deposits; ether and other altcoins also revive
